DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate intermediate long-term effectiveness stand-alone atherectomy treatment peripheral arterial disease leg .
DOC.brief_title: Study SilverHawk®/TurboHawk® Lower Extremity Vessels ( DEFINITIVE™ LE )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Has Rutherford Clinical Category Score 1 6 . Has evidence ≥ 50 % stenosis occlusion superficial femoral , popliteal , anterior tibial , posterior tibial and/or peroneal artery , confirm angiography . Has identifiable distal target vessel upon completion intervention , anticipate provide reconstitution blood flow foot . Exchangeable guidewire must cross lesion ( ) , ability catheter cross lesion . Each discrete target lesion 's length ≤ 20 cm . Reference vessel diameter ≥ 1.5 mm ≤ 7 mm . Exclusion Criteria Has surgical endovascular procedure target vessel within 14 day prior index procedure . Has plan surgical intervention endovascular procedure within 30 day index procedure . Has previous peripheral bypass affect target limb . Has endstage renal disease define undergoing hemodialysis kidney failure . Has presence severe calcification target lesion ( ) . Has instent restenosis target lesion . Has aneurysmal target vessel . Has significant stenosis occlusion inflow tract revascularized prior treatment target vessel . Has perforation , dissection injury access target vessel require additional stenting surgical intervention prior enrollment . Has disease precludes safe advancement SilverHawk/TurboHawk device target lesion ( ) . Has previous amputation metatarsal line target limb . Has endstage renal disease define undergoing hemodialysis kidney failure .
